author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Eifel walking region voted Germany’s most beautiful walking trailTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Eifel walking region voted Germany’s most beautiful walking trail
The Eifel walking region has been voted as the most beautiful walking trail in Germany followed by the Pyrmont Felsensteig and the Eifelsteig taking the top spots in the ‘day tour’ and ‘long-distance trail’ categories respectively. Both routes delight walkers with their breathtaking panoramic scenery.
The annual poll was run by specialist walkers’ magazine ‘Wandermagazin’, in which 16,800 people cast their vote for Germany’s most beautiful walking trail.
Second place in the long-distance category went to the Goldsteig in Bavaria, which was followed by the Lahnwanderweg in third.
Both the Eifelsteig Trail, which runs from Aachen to Trier, and the Goldsteig Trail are quality-certified footpaths with premium status.
Certificates for the winning paths were presented on 5 September 2015 at TourNatur, the walking and hiking expo in Düsseldorf.
A grand total of 13,400 kilometres spread across twelve different states have now been awarded the Wanderbares Deutschland seal of quality by the German Ramblers’ Association.
